get.description: Get a list of existing Compute quotas.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

availabilitySetCount.description: Maximum number of availability sets allowed.

maxAllocationPremiumManagedDisksAndSnaps.description: Maximum number of managed disks and snapshots of type premium allowed.

maxAllocationStandardManagedDisksAndSnap.description: Maximum number of managed disks and snapshots of type standard allowed.

virtualMachineCount.description: Maximum number of virtual machines allowed.

vmScaleSetCount.description: Maximum number of scale sets allowed.

items.description: Holds Compute quota information used to control resource allocation.

parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

schema.description: Holds Compute quota information used to control resource allocation.
